alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hillsborough County through 715 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Lake-Orient Park, or near Temple Terrace, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, East Lake-Orient Park, Busch Gardens, Florida State Fairgrounds, University Of South Florida and Orient Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of brief funnel clouds. These funnel clouds can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
